thread.title: BREAKING NEWS: Spurrier retiring as South Carolina coach
thread.title_full: BREAKING NEWS: Spurrier retiring as South Carolina coach

title: BREAKING NEWS: Spurrier retiring as South Carolina coach
text:
South Carolina head coach Steve Spurrier during SEC Media Days last summer. Posted: Monday, October 12, 2015 8:45 pm | Updated: 8:51 pm, Mon Oct 12, 2015. BREAKING NEWS: Spurrier retiring as South Carolina coach 
South Carolina head football coach Steve Spurrier is retiring, effectively immediately, according to The State newspaper. 
The paper, citing an unidentified source, said Spurrier informed his team Monday night that he is retiring and that an interim coach will be named Tuesday. 
More on this story as it becomes available.
